h2_title: The Scorpionlord Boss Fight and Guide
content: Finding openings can be difficult, especially when Immobilize doesn't last long and deflecting anything but his more standard claw hits will just send you tumbling back.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Scorpionlord.md', within the main section titled 'The Scorpionlord', specifically from the subsection 'The Scorpionlord Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Finding openings can be difficult, especially when Immobilize doesn't last long and deflecting anything but his more standard claw hits will just send you tumbling back.
